column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Food: This is a classic tapas place - nothing new
column2: nothing different. Very solid menu but it lacks inventive dishes. To boot
column3: I don't think the flavors or ingredients were that good. The paella was extremely salty
column4: the sauteed shrimp tasted like frozen shrimp from Trader Joes
column5: and the brussel sprouts were a snooze.
